messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: Just a rant
messages.msgSnippet: OMG!  What the hell will they come up with next?? Someone please explain how this makes sense: Look out, kids. Mom has found the... WHEEL OF DREADED
messages.messageBody:
OMG! What the hell will they come up with next??

Someone please explain how this makes sense:

"Look out, kids. Mom has found the...

WHEEL OF DREADED CONSEQUENES!

An upbeat, fun, and totally unique behavior modification tool for parents
wishing to modify their childrens' behavior."

Yeah, I get such intense pleasure from handing down dreaded punishment to my
kids! What a crock of shit!

Jennifer

messages.subject: Fw: Just a rant
messages.msgSnippet: Guess it helps if I put the link in....sorry.  http://www.consequences.ca. Jinger ... From: The Burton Bunch To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent:
messages.messageBody:
Guess it helps if I put the link in....sorry. http://www.consequences.ca
Jinger
----- Original Message -----
From: The Burton Bunch
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, June 13, 2003 9:48 AM
Subject: Just a rant


Has anyone else been sent this site on an email?? Who thinks up this stuff anyway?! This and the ads on the radio for the videos that teach manners.....geez - when will people get it that if they just live and love with their kids these things are not a problem!
Jinger
